entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.title: Waterlogue: Photo to Painting
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$5.99 â†’ $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $5.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$4.99

Application Description

You donâ€™t need to paint to create beautiful watercolor imagesâ€”Waterlogue captures the essence of your photos in brilliant, liquid color. See the world like an artist. FEATURES: â€¢ Waterlogue transforms your photos into luminous watercolors â€¢ Watch Waterlogue paint as it transforms your images â€¢ Use your watercolors to create an artistâ€™s journal or notebook â€¢ Save your watercolors and share via Instagram, Facebook, Bluesky, Mastodon, Message, Email, and more â€¢ Create beautiful, high-res, frameable art for your home â€¢ 14 pre-set styles to customize your watercolors by controlling wetness, pen outlines, and color â€¢ Image export at high resolution â€¢ Control of borders, lightness, and detail â€¢ Includes example images â€¢ Awarded "App Store Best of 2014" by Apple â€¢ From Tinrocket, creator of This by Tinrocket (App Store Best of 2016), Olli (App Store Best of 2017), Percolator, and Popsicolor WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING ABOUT WATERLOGUE: â€¢ Oprah's holiday pick! "Made with Love: DIY Gifts"â€”O, The Oprah Magazine â€¢ â€œâ€¦with Waterlogue, itâ€™s clear that thereâ€™s a very thoughtful human touch behind the appâ€™s painterly algorithms.â€ â€”WIRED, Mar. 2014 â€¢ â€œâ€¦Waterlogue is going to utterly amaze you, as itâ€™s the first app Iâ€™ve seen that gives results that really look like a watercolor painting.â€ â€”Cult of Mac, Dec. 2013 â€¢ â€œWatercolor apps may not be a new idea, but Waterlogue does it in a gorgeous, intuitive way, and itâ€™s quite a pleasure to use.â€ â€”AppAdvice.com, Dec. 2013 â€¢ â€œWaterlogue App (from Tinrocket) looks awesome!â€ â€”Jack Hollingsworth, Photographer, Dec. 12, 2013 â€¢ â€œIt goes beyond typical Photoshop watercolor filters because it has more visual intelligence, and more of the feel of the real paint.â€ â€”James Gurney, Artist and Author of Dinotopia, gurneyjourney.blogspot.com, Dec. 2013 â€¢ â€œEver since digital imagery came into its own over 20 years ago, there have been attempts to mimic traditional media. Where others have failed, Waterlogue nails it.â€ â€”PatrickSaunders.com, Dec. 2013 KEEP UP WITH TINROCKET: â€¢ Follow @Tinrocket on Instagram for the latest! â€¢ Weâ€™re here to help: If you have a question or need assistance, you can always email us at support@tinrocket.com â€¢ If you like Waterlogue, please consider leaving an App Store review or rating. Every review counts and helps indie developers like ourselves. WaterlogueÂ® and See the world like an artistÂ® are registered trademarks of Tinrocket, LLC

entry.title: Solar Arc: Sun and Moon Widget
entry.id: Solar Arc: Sun and Moon Widget-us-1768416196848
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$3.99 â†’ $2.99 [$1.99 ~ $4.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$2.99

Application Description

Plan sun and moon positions before you arrive. Predict golden hour, moonrise, and light directionâ€”plus widgets that keep key times visible at a glance. Know where the light will beâ€”before you go. Solar Arc is a sun and moon planning tool built for people who care about timing, direction, and alignment. Instead of guessing or arriving too late, you can predict exactly how light will move across a locationâ€”hours or days in advance. Whether youâ€™re scouting, planning a shoot, or timing a sunset or moonrise, Solar Arc gives you clarity before you commit. -- Plan with Precision â€¢ Live Sun & Moon Arc Visualization See real-time solar and lunar paths with compass-based direction. â€¢ Golden Hour & Blue Hour Forecasts Know the precise windows when light is at its best. â€¢ Moonrise & Moonset Planning Track lunar timing and position for night and landscape work. â€¢ Forecasting & Location Planning Preview sun and moon paths for any date, anywhere. â€¢ Offline Access All core planning tools work without a connection in the field.

entry.title: Black Border 2
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$1.99 â†’ $0.49 [$0.49 ~ $1.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$0.49

Application Description

Inspect papers, prevent smugglingâ€”keep the border safe or profit from corruption. Ready to become a Border Police Officer? Step into the world of Black Border 2: Border Patrol Simulator and experience the intense pressure of national security. As a Customs Officer, your duty is to protect the nation from illegal smuggling. Inspect passports, scrutinize documents, and use advanced tools to make life-or-death decisions in this gripping police simulator game. Take on the duty of a Border Patrol Agent and protect your nation's borders. Your role is crucial: Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports, permits, and papers to approve or reject entrants. Advanced Tools: Utilize X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and weigh stations to check vehicle legitimacy. Canine Unit: Deploy your loyal service dog to sniff out concealed contraband and uncover secrets. Strategic Decisions: Every choice you make impacts the safety of your country. NEW FEATURES in Black Border 2: Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports and permits to approve or reject entrants as a customs officer. Endless Mode: Test your border patrol skills in a nonstop, challenging experience. Bus Arrivals: Manage large buses and check every passenger's documents carefully. Advanced Scanning: Utilize new X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and contraband. Weigh Stations: Ensure vehicle weights match their records, a key part of your police duty. Canine Unit: Your faithful service dog is now a crucial partner in finding hidden contraband. Each day as a border inspector brings new challenges that will push your customs police skills to the limit. Are you ready to face the pressure and become a true hero of national security? Download Black Border 2 today and get ready to defend the nation!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Seoul Exorcist 1111: Roguelite
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$5.99 â†’ $3.99 [$3.99 ~ $5.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$3.99

In-App Purchases

  • 200,000 x Coinsï¼š$9.99
  • 80,000 x Coinsï¼š$4.99
  • 40,000 x Coinsï¼š$2.99
  • 10,000 x Coinsï¼š$0.99

Application Description

Think Fast, Strike Faster! As the ultimate exorcist, choose your attacks wisely, upgrade combat deck, combine traits and items, and save the cursed soulsâ€”before death finds you. â–ª Real-Time Turn-Based Combat Enemies react the moment you make a decisionâ€”! Fast, tense action with every move. â–ª 4 Characters with Unique Strategies Each with 8 uniques attack types, exclusive animations, and 2 passive traits. Adapt your playstyle for every run. â–ª Time Limit - Think Fast, Strike Faster! You have just 7 minutes to defeat all enemies in each run. You've been relentlessly trained for this moment. â–ª Item & Trait Combinations Strategic synergies that activate automatically during battle. Timing and adaptability are the keys to victory! â–ª Roguelite Clear all 7 maps and the boss in a single runâ€”or get reset! But clearing the same map 3 times unlocks progress. Collect coins, build a stronger deck, and dive back in! â–ª 12 Languages Supported â€¨Korean, English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Brazilian Portuguese, and Russian. â–ª Offline Game All data is stored locally. No network required. Be Aware. Uninstalling the app will erase saved data. â–ªDiscord https://discord.gg/UaZApdWG93 â–ªFor inquires / bug report snowgames0629@gmail.com

entry.title: FoodyLife : The Food Diary App
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$1.99 â†’ Free [Free ~ $1.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

Application Description

You will be able to explore your eating habits visually and improve your eating habits. No calories and no numbers are shown in the app! Features: + Beautifully minimalist food diary app + In-App Camera And Filter + No calories No Pressure + Visualizes all your diets and shows your diet balance clearly! + Crazy and Interactive Foody Face + Learn how to eat mindfully and correctly right now! Donâ€™t make Foody Face angry! Tap download right now! ---------- The inspiration behind FoodyLife is that nowadays people pay little attention to what they eat and often eat unhealthy food. Although there are many similar apps on the market (e.g. Fitness App, Calorie counter...), most of them focus mainly on â€œnumbersâ€, such as how many calories the user has eaten and how long the user should exercise to get rid of those calories, or sending the user notifications when they should get up to exercise or if they have eaten too much. FoodyLifeâ€™ is an app that helps users track their daily diet by allowing them to keep their own food diary. The app shows neither calories nor numbers; instead, users have only to take a picture, enter their diet information, then they are able their overall diet balance. It is very simple and highly effective. Users can explore their eating habits visually, improving self-consciousness about eating habits.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Afterplace
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$6.99 â†’ $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $6.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$0.99

Application Description

An open world adventure game filled with silly characters and terrible secrets. Afterplace is an adventurous indie game for mobile devices. It's a huge open world, full of hidden secrets, treasures, and creatures. You'll run around the woods, fight monsters, and talk to ostensibly shady characters! All from your pocket! Be warned though - you never know what the forest might be hiding, and not all trails are paved. Labyrinths and dungeons are tucked away in the most concealed nooks. There are no waypoints in Afterplace. You'll have to forge your own path. Afterplace has been designed from the ground up to be a fast, fluid, beautiful experience for mobile. There are no virtual buttons. You can move and attack by touching anywhere. You can tap objects directly to interact or attack, use two thumbs like a traditional controller, or control the game with a physical gamepad. The game will adapt dynamically to your play style. Pick up and set down the game at your own pace, it will always save your progress. Afterplace is made to feel like a full-fledged indie adventure game that fits in your pocket. About the Author: Afterplace is made by one person, Evan Kice. A former software engineer from Austin TX, Evan quit his job (to the dismay of his friends and family) and has been working full time on Afterplace since early 2019. The initial game released in December of 2022, but Evan plans on continuing to support and polish the game when he can!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾å…³äºç”Ÿã€æ­»ã€å¿ƒæ„¿ä¸å»¶ç»­çš„Appã€‚ å°æ—¶å€™ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¥ä¸ºè‡ªå·±æ˜¯ä¸ä¼šè€å»çš„å½¼å¾—Â·æ½˜ï¼Œå´ç»ˆç©¶æ•Œä¸è¿‡å¥åº·ç£¨æŸï¼Œå®¹é¢œè€å»ã€‚ æ—¶é’ˆè½¬åŠ¨ï¼Œç”Ÿå‘½æµé€ï¼Œä½†æ¯ä¸€æ¬¡å¿ƒè·³éƒ½å¯ä»¥æ›´åŠ æœ‰åŠ›ã€‚ æœ‰æ—¶å€™ï¼Œç”Ÿå‘½åªæ˜¯ä¸€è¿ä¸²çš„æ•°å­—ï¼Œå¤šå°‘å¹´ï¼Œå¤šå°‘æœˆï¼Œå¤šå°‘å°æ—¶ï¼Œå¤šå°‘åˆ†é’Ÿã€‚å½“ä½ æ„è¯†åˆ°è¿™ä¸ªæ—¶ï¼Œå¾€å¾€é™·å…¥å·¨å¤§çš„è™šæ— æ„Ÿä¹‹ä¸­ï¼Œæƒ¶æä¸èƒ½è‡ªæ‹”ã€‚ è€Œç°åœ¨ï¼Œè¿™äº›æ•°å­—å¯ä»¥æˆä¸ºä½ é‡å¡‘ç”Ÿå‘½çš„åæ ‡ï¼ŒæŒ‡å¼•ä½ èµ°å‘æ›´å¥åº·ã€æ›´é•¿ä¹…çš„æœªæ¥ã€‚ ç”Ÿè¾° 2.0 é€šè¿‡ AI åˆ†æå’Œç§‘å­¦åˆ¤æ–­ï¼Œä¸ä»…é¢„æµ‹ç”Ÿå‘½çš„ç»ˆç‚¹ï¼Œæ›´ä¸ºä½ é“ºå°±å»¶é•¿ç”Ÿå‘½çš„é“è·¯ï¼š - æ¢ç´¢ä½ çš„ç”Ÿå‘½æ—¶é’Ÿï¼šäº†è§£å½“ä¸‹çš„é¢„æœŸå¯¿å‘½ï¼Œç›´é¢ç”Ÿå‘½çš„æœ‰é™ä¸çè´µã€‚ - å‘ç°å»¶å¯¿çš„å¯èƒ½ï¼šçœ‹è§æ”¹å˜å¥åº·ä¹ æƒ¯èƒ½ä¸ºä½ å¸¦æ¥å¤šå°‘é¢å¤–çš„ç”Ÿå‘½æ—¶å…‰ã€‚ - èšåˆå¥åº·æ•°æ®ï¼šè‡ªåŠ¨è¿½è¸ªç¡çœ ã€é”»ç‚¼ã€å‹åŠ›ï¼ˆHRVï¼‰ã€ç»æœŸã€å–æ°´ç­‰åä½™ç§å¥åº·æ•°æ® ç¾å›½è¯—äººçº³Â·æ–¯å¾…å°”åœ¨87å²é‚£å¹´å†™é“ï¼š "å¦‚æœæˆ‘èƒ½å¤Ÿä»å¤´æ´»è¿‡ï¼Œæˆ‘ä¼šè¯•ç€çŠ¯æ›´å¤šçš„é”™ã€‚ æˆ‘ä¼šæ”¾æ¾ä¸€ç‚¹ï¼Œæˆ‘ä¼šçµæ´»ä¸€ç‚¹ã€‚ æˆ‘ä¼šçˆ¬æ›´å¤šçš„å±±ï¼Œæ¸¸æ›´å¤šçš„æ²³ï¼Œçœ‹æ›´å¤šçš„æ—¥è½ã€‚" å› ä¸ºäº†è§£ç”Ÿå‘½çš„ç»ˆç‚¹ï¼Œæ‰èƒ½æ›´å¥½åœ°çæƒœå½“ä¸‹çš„æ¯ä¸€åˆ»ã€‚ç”Ÿè¾°2.0 æ¢ç´¢å¥åº·çš„å¯èƒ½ï¼Œè®©æˆ‘ä»¬æˆä¸ºä½ å¥åº·æ—…ç¨‹çš„é•¿ä¹…ä¼™ä¼´ã€‚ ã€ç”Ÿè¾° App ä¼šå‘˜æœåŠ¡è¯´æ˜ã€‘ 1.ä¼šå‘˜åŒ…å«å‡ ç§è®¢è´­ç±»å‹ è®¢é˜…å‘¨æœŸï¼š1ä¸ªæœˆã€3ä¸ªæœˆã€12ä¸ªæœˆ 2.é¦–æ¬¡è®¢è´­åä¼šé€šè¿‡iTunesè´¦æˆ·ç›´æ¥æ”¯ä»˜ï¼›è´¦æˆ·ä¼šåœ¨åˆ°æœŸå‰24å°æ—¶å†…æ‰£è´¹ï¼Œæ‰£è´¹æˆåŠŸåè‡ªåŠ¨é¡ºå»¶ä¸€ä¸ªè®¢é˜…å‘¨æœŸ 3.æœ¬æœåŠ¡ç”±æ‚¨è‡ªä¸»é€‰æ‹©æ˜¯å¦ç»­è®¢ï¼Œå¦‚éœ€å–æ¶ˆï¼Œè¯·åœ¨è®¢é˜…åˆ°æœŸ24å°æ—¶å‰ï¼Œåœ¨ AppleID è®¾ç½®ä¸­å–æ¶ˆ 4.ç”Ÿè¾°App ä¼šå‘˜åè®® ç”Ÿè¾°App ä¼šå‘˜æœåŠ¡åè®®ï¼šhttps://post.jellow.club/whatslife-payment/ 5.ç”Ÿè¾°App è½¯ä»¶åè®®ä¸éšç§æ”¿ç­– ç”Ÿè¾° è½¯ä»¶è®¸å¯åŠæœåŠ¡åè®®ï¼šhttps://post.jellow.club/whatslife-agreement/ ç”Ÿè¾° éšç§åè®®ï¼šhttps://post.jellow.club/whatslife-privacy/

entry.title: Neo Monsters
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$0.99 â†’ Free [Free ~ $0.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

In-App Purchases

  • 13 Gemsï¼š$7.99
  • 6 Gemsï¼š$3.99
  • 1 Gemï¼š$0.99
  • 48 Gemsï¼š$28.99
  • 150 Gemsï¼š$79.99
  • 74 Gemsï¼š$40.99
  • 28 Gemsï¼š$14.99

Application Description

Become a Legend! Capture over 2000 Animated Monsters and Duel in Real-Time PvP! Form your team and battle for victory! Capture, train, and evolve to become the champion in one of the biggest monster battling RPGs! Neo Monsters is an addictive strategy RPG that features epic 4v4 battles between two teams of up to 16 monsters. The unique turn-based battle system allows you to come up with powerful chain strategies by combining hundreds of abilities. Hunt down the strongest monsters and harness their power, then take the battle online to dominate in exciting PvP battles and leagues! Are you ready to take the challenge? â–¶Features: â— Build your Monster Collection â€¢ Capture and evolve over 1000 fully animated monsters! â€¢ Train your monsters and unleash their deadly potential. â€¢ Collect evolution ingredients to create the ultimate power! â— Form a Battle Strategy â€¢ Build the ultimate team of up to 16 monsters. â€¢ Defeat your opponents in epic turn-based 4v4 battles! â€¢ Create devastating combinations from hundreds of abilities. â— Become the Champion â€¢ Conquer six Leagues and take on the Grand Champion in 60+ hours of adventure! â€¢ Explore multiple islands and dungeons on your journey. â€¢ Follow the story to uncover the truth behind your late uncleâ€™s atrocity. â— Take the Battle Online â€¢ Duel players from around the world in PvP leagues! â€¢ Complete 100+ online missions. â€¢ Take on weekly updated events to unlock big rewards. Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NeoMonstersOfficial/ Join the Neo Monsters community: http://www.neomonstersforum.com/ Issues or questions? Contact our support: neomonsupport.gameplay@zigzagame.net Terms of Service: https://www.zigzagame.com/terms/ Privacy Policy: https://www.zigzagame.com/privacy-policy/

entry.title: Unboxing the Cryptic Killer
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$2.99 â†’ $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $2.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$1.99

Application Description

SOLVE A CRYPTIC BOX Unboxing the Cryptic Killer is the first standalone chapter to the cooperative point-and-click puzzle game series 'Cryptic Killer'. Join forces with a friend and play as detective partners Ally and Old Dog in our debut two-player escape room adventure. IMPORTANT: "Unboxing the Cryptic Killer" is a 2-player cooperative puzzle game, that requires each player to have their own copy on either mobile, tablet, PC or Mac. Internet connection and voice communication are essential. Need a Player Two? Join our Discord community! Two seasoned detectives, Ally and Old Dog, are entangled in a chilling unsolved case. Lured on a perilous trail, they fall into the clutches of the enigmatic Cryptic Killer they've been relentlessly pursuing. The stakes are sky-high as two innocent lives hang in the balance. In order to save them, Ally and Old Dog must unravel a box of intricate puzzles masterfully designed by the nefarious killer. Test your mettle and join this high-stakes race against time, where every puzzle solved is a step closer to unmasking the Cryptic Killer. THE ONLY WAY TO ESCAPE IS TO WORK TOGETHER Unboxing the Cryptic Killer is a puzzle for exactly two players. The name of the game is collaboration. Each player takes on one of the two roles and works their way through a series of challenging puzzles. You'll each see one half of the same puzzle and must work together to crack the codes and escape the Cryptic Killer's clutches. FEATURES LIST â–¶Two Player Co-Op In Unboxing the Cryptic Killer, the detectives are separated. Youâ€™ll see different items and clues than your partner, and will be tested on your communication! â–¶Challenging Collaborative Puzzles Two brains are better than one when it comes to cracking the Cryptic Killer's codes. â–¶Unravel a Thrilling Story Track the Cryptic Killer's movements as Detectives Old Dog and Ally in this ongoing murder mystery saga. â–¶Explore Illustrated Worlds Unboxing the Cryptic Killer features hand-illustrated environments that are inspired by noir novels. â–¶Draw onâ€¦ Everything! You cannot solve a case without taking notes. At any time in the game, you can whip out a notebook and pen to make notes and scribble on your environment.

iPad
